spell.name: devastate
spell.description: Strike the target for 10% damage.

spell.name: intimidating_shout
spell.description: Unleash a terrifying roar, reducing damage to your foes by 20% for 5 sec.

spell.name: cleave
spell.description: Strikes opponent for 15%-20% damage with.

spell.name: fortify
spell.description: Temporarily increases your armor by 25%, reducing damage dealt to you for 60 sec.

spell.name: bash
spell.description: Stuns opponent for 5 sec, and deals 10% damage.

spell.name: hemorrhage
spell.description: Tears open target dealing 5% damage initially, then deals up to 25 damage in 1 min.

spell.name: stomp
spell.description: Slams the ground, dealing 10 damage to nearby enemy units with a 20% chance to stun for 3 sec.

spell.name: overpower
spell.description: Strike at the opponent for 15% of damage. Cannot be blocked, dodged, or parried.

spell.name: frenzy
spell.description: Increases attack speed by 50% and movement by 25%, but deals 5 damage every 5 sec to you. Lasts 120 sec.

spell.name: searing_arrow
spell.description: Shoot a flaming arrow at target that deals up to 25 damage in 75 sec.

spell.name: concussive_shot
spell.description: Hits the target for 10% damage, and dazes the target. Slowing movement and attack speed by 50% for 10 sec.

spell.name: piercing_shot
spell.description: A powerful shot at deals 10% damage that ignores target's armor.

spell.name: stinging_shot
spell.description: Fire a poison tipped arrow dealing 20% damage and 5 damage every 2 sec for 30 sec.

spell.name: explosive_arrow
spell.description: Fire a dynamite tipped arrow at target. When detonated, damages all units in blast radius by 10 damage.

spell.name: precise_shot
spell.description: Aimed shot that deals 10%-20% damage.

spell.name: sniper_shot
spell.description: Fires a well-aimed shot dealing 15% damage. Range of shot increased by 25%.

spell.name: explosive_trap
spell.description: Plant an explosive trap, that'll explode when a unit passes near it. Arms itself in 5 sec, and self-destructs in 30 sec after.

spell.name: volley
spell.description: Rapidly launch 3 arrows at target dealing 5% damage each arrow.

spell.name: fireball
spell.description: Hurls a fiery ball that deals 5% of damage and 10 damage over 30 sec.

spell.name: shadow_bolt
spell.description: Sends a shadowy bolt at target, dealing 12% damage.

spell.name: frost_bolt
spell.description: Launches a bolt of frost at enemy. Deals 10% damage and slows target's movement by 30% for 10 sec.

spell.name: divine_heal
spell.description: Restores 10%-30% of health.

spell.name: siphon_mana
spell.description: Drain up to 20% mana from enemy over 10 sec.

spell.name: haste
spell.description: Increase your movement speed by 50% for 10 sec.

spell.name: slow
spell.description: Slows target's movement and attack speed by 50% for 15 sec.

spell.name: arcane_bolt
spell.description: Hurl a lightning bolt at the enemy, dealing 12%, and then a 50% chance to jump to nearby enemies. Affects up to 3 units.

spell.name: mind_blast
spell.description: Blast the target's mind for 20% damage.

spell.name: meteor
spell.description: Rain down a meteror at target location, dealing 20% damage at target and 5% damage to units within the blast radius.
